name: Emergency? Yeah!
description:
Emergency? Yeah! is a book of short stories written by James McFay. 

These 22 shorts are pulp fiction at their finest, with an emphasis on fast, great plots, perfect for reading on the bus or just before bed.

The stories feature, among others, a racing car driver whose practice lap times are the fastest in the world but hasn't won a race, a film director who is given a chance to live his life over again with a different woman, The Most Famous Man In The World and his game-changing invention and the notorious Halcyon Days: Part 1 and 2. 

180+ pages, including a Secret Section which will require puzzle-solving using the design of the book and may lead to a hidden story!

name: Tiger DVD
description:
TIGER is the first, heartbreaking feature from Beaufort. An intimate romantic drama about two models who fall in love during the winter fashion season in Tokyo, only for their relationship to combust when their stay extends.

This cinematic EP from the makers of the 'Fun Punch' music video by Bag Raiders was shot on luscious 16mm film featuring a cast of models who were working in Tokyo at the time and ranges from the cramped agency apartments of downtown Omote-sando to the snowy fields of Kurohime. TIGER is the only non-Japanese film to have been selected for official competition in the prestigious Japanese Pia Film Festival.

There is a huge amount of extra content on this two-disc set, including deleted scenes, model interviews, short story booklet, a data disc containing an entirely separate extension soundtrack composed by Beaufort and a mobile-ready Japanese subtitled version for watching on the train. This version is PAL and ALL REGIONS.

Shipping is a flat rate of $8AUD. 

www.beaufort.asia

name: Tiger T-Shirt
description:
White cotton T-shirt with 'TIGER' written on it with the 'BEAUFORT' logo underneath. 

The lettering contains graphics from the DVD case. 

Please specify size in your order. Model pictured is wearing a Large. 

Payments through Paypal, with flat rate for shipping at $10 AUD.

name: Emergency? Yeah! + Tiger DVD + Tiger T-shirt
description:
Buy the book Emergency? Yeah! with the Tiger 2-disc set and T-shirt and save a billion dollars. 

Great bundle-gift for that creative friend for whom you never really know what to buy.
